pages.text: $(li)The Evokers are powerfull summoners who are able to attack you summoning fangs on the ground that makes damage to you. It is able to summon $(l:patchouli:illagers/vex)Vexes$(/l) to attack you too.$(br)$(li)On death they may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l), a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/totem_of_undying)Totem of Undying$(/l), and the $(l:patchouli:enders_journey/ender_eyes)Magical Eye$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can only be found in the $(l:patchouli:illagers/mansion)Mansions$(/l).
